# Angular Prompt Library

Copy any prompt into an LLM session to keep Angular 20 work consistent with P&C clean architecture.

## Available Prompts

- prompt-angular-clean-architecture.md – end-to-end setup, SSR, signals, zoneless
- prompt-feature-slice.md – add or refactor feature slices
- prompt-standalone-component.md – reusable component blueprint
- prompt-angular-ssr.md – Universal build/deploy checklist
- prompt-common-components-library.md – shared library for UI primitives
